# Squid Game Islands

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/squid-game-islands-in-fortnite>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T22:57:07.585557

---

Bring the games and deception with **Squid Game** brand islands. Explore the world of Squid Game in Fortnite with a wide range of tools and assets. These resources are designed for all creators to craft unique experiences that capture the essence of the brand.

[![Squid Game in UEFN and Fortnite Creative](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/8b1af357-a368-4b2f-89ef-4f4b99bfd29c?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/8b1af357-a368-4b2f-89ef-4f4b99bfd29c?resizing_type=fit)

Squid Game Characters

You can access the Squid Game feature set in Creative and Unreal Editor for Fortnite (UEFN) starter islands. However, certain features, like the **Minigame Mastery** and **Social Deduction** gameplay templates, are only available in UEFN.

[![](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/571e71e8-6340-45c0-a9e1-b6a9f5d2869f?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/571e71e8-6340-45c0-a9e1-b6a9f5d2869f?resizing_type=fit)

UEFN Brand Templates

To learn more about accessing brand content, see [Game Collections](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/game-collections-in-fortnite).

## Let the Games Begin

Use the following resources when building your Squid Game islands.

[![Squid Game Brand and Creator Rules](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/82a402d3-a977-40d3-bd71-c0db2fddad6e?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Squid Game Brand and Creator Rules

Brand rules for working with Squid Game assets and templates to create and publish custom Squid Games Islands.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/squid-game-brand-and-creator-rules-in-fortnite)[![Working> With Squid Game Islands](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/666bb2dc-ca7d-44fd-a02d-622a4d9ce653?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Working With Squid Game Islands

Learn more about creating custom Squid Game islands using exclusive Squid Game content.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/working-with-squid-game-islands-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)[![Minigame> Mastery Template](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/3afae326-74a1-46ed-9c5f-06bf12c3f5da?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Minigame Mastery Template

Discover ways to build exciting new mini-games with devices and examples that'll help you create your very own Squid Game island.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/squid-game-minigame-mastery-template-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite)[![Social> Deduction Template](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/cb2944cf-85a1-4239-85e3-2e71440535a0?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Social Deduction Template

Learn how to use devices to build all kinds of social deception for Squid Game islands through gameplay examples.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/squid-game-social-deduction-template-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite>)
